attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Service personnel in all areas go and risk their lives to go out to war bound countries to protect our country and the people in it. They leave their families for long periods of time by no choice of their own. There are footballers who get paid tons more just by kicking a bit of leather around. Not asking for much but at the moment we are not even reaching minimum wage this is just ridiculous after everything we do

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
